dialogue.content: There is a mysterious liquid spilled across the ground, keeping you from reaching the DMO area. Lick it?
It tasted like a mysterious liquid.
Take the ingredient?
Fluffy thing that is dry on the outside, and squishy on the inside. It looks perfect for holding edible things together.
Flaky paper thingy. Pretty sure it’s some kind of bread, or just fancy cardboard.
A big chunk of something red and firm. I've been informed it used to moo.
This is definitely cheese, but earlier I could have sworn it whispered something to me. So, this is definitely sentient cheese. It has feelings and dreams.
A bunch of green leaves. They look crunchy, and taste like grass.
Round, wet, red thing... fruit? Vegetable? Confused berry?
Some sort of 'sauce'. Not sure it is entirely edible... or what it could even possibly be used for.
A bunch of bright squishy objects. Possibly candy, possibly plants. Tastes like a rainbow of color!
Ah yes, of course. These are the seeds from the pinecone of the Colorado pinyon, otherwise known as the Pinus edulis. Glad my biology degree finally paid off!
Some sort of long green thing. It looks like, with a little hope and determination, it could be a pickle if it wanted to.
Some sort of angry, tangy liquid. Smells like sadness and sour grapes. Drinkability: unclear.
White sandy grit. Despite its look, it doesn’t taste like sand. Is this sugar?
Little brown hats, probably safe fungus... but nobody warned me if they were poison.
Pale chunks of meat from an animal that looks like it used to fly. Like... a flying cow!
A bunch of thin yellow strings. They break when I try to break them. Simply put, they need nourishment and possibly the love of a grandma.
Looks entirely like milk. But like... fatter. Fat milk. Big fat milk. Sorry – I am being rude. To the milk. Fat milk.
Strong smelling onion-ish lump. Even a small amount made my breath terrifying.
Small white crystals. Despite its look, it doesn’t taste like sand. Is this salt?
Yellowish creamy brick. Probably made of cream that has been violently reshaped – what the hell does it want?
Aajhsodi AISDOInjkdn iAOKSnkng kNASDlmn khpAs  paojsd ??????
At a stove, take some steak and dairy, put it between some loaf.
In a bowl, throw together some greens, throw in some red – sliced – and then finish it off with some 'sauce'.
In a bowl, throw together some greens, then add some other colors. Toss in some of those nuts (hehe) we got last week.
In a bowl, throw together some of that pre-pickle, then add some flavor crystals make it tangy.
Smother some steak with the fungi, then cover that in some dough. Put it in the oven.
Take the little bird fella and smother it in fungi and 'sauce'. Put it in the oven.
Turn the cow into balls (hehe), then add it to some noodles covered in red. Oh, do this at the stove.
At the stove, cook some noodle, with a creamy and cheesy sauce.
At the stove, heat a bowl of red, and make it creamy. Scare a vampire for flavor.
We mistakenly got a shipment of a bunch of random vegetables. Go to the stove and just throw them in a pot with some flavor crystals – and maybe scare a vampire.
They want a dessert. Add some flavor crystals and give it a churn. Toss it all in the oven
They want a dessert. Add some colors and cover it in 'sauce'. Mix it together in a bowl and serve.
They want a dessert. Add some colors and throw it all in some dough. Then, put it in the oven.
